question: As per the Directorate general of foreign trade, ban on the exports of which product is to be lifted from January 2021?
explanation:
As per the recent notification from the Directorate General of foreign trade, the Central Government will lift the ban on export of all varieties of onion from January 1, 2021.
In September this year, the government had banned the export of all varieties, when there were signs of depletion. Now as the supply crunch has eased with good winter harvests and imports, the export ban is to be lifted.
